replies.body: Sorry but it's not much of a "avicus trailer" xd, you showed for pretty much more than half the video nebula/ctw, didn't show all the gamemodes (I saw CTW, Nebula & The walls). Then the funny part that made me laugh in class was that you were breaking an avicus rule by blocking arrows when your in spectator mode xd. Otherwise it's nice

replies.body:
You can add in more first person PvP.
Also, try show every game mode and show a good set of footage, like the highlights. For example, for DTM, try show rushing or bridging and then show some monument destroying.
Other than that, it's really good!
